bibl.title: Some Traits of Monetary Inflations in Antiquity and the Middle Ages.

series.title: Seminar (An Annual Extraordinary Number of The Jurist)

bibl.note: 1. Monetary inflations in the classical world. - 2. Ancient, medieval and modern monetary inflations before the age of modern capitalism. Moneta imaginaria. - 3. Graeco-Egyptian papyri and our knowledge of ancient currencies. - 4. Moneta imaginaria in Antiquity.
